name: Flutter: Butterfly Sanctuary
description:
The best butterfly game! Collect, breed and grow butterflies through their incredible life cycle in your own beautiful forest. Over 400 species ready to collect!
Each butterfly is a vibrant depiction of a real life species with stunning wing patterns and unique behavioural characteristics. Collect endless varieties of brilliantly colored flowers to attract each new butterfly species. From chrysalis to caterpillar to butterfly, these cute creatures need your help to grow!
COLLECT
See if you can discover and collect the huge range of real life butterfly species!
BEAUTIFUL AMAZON ENVIRONMENT
Grow and expand your forest with new life and color by collecting and planting special flowers to attract new butterfly species.
REAL LIFE SPECIES
Collect butterflies from all around the world and add them to your ever-expanding “Flutterpedia”. Each species has a unique fact sheet on their characteristics and natural history.
EVENTS
Every month you’ll be challenged to collect a limited set of brand new butterflies.
TUNE IN, BLISS OUT
Listen to the Rainforest in the palm of your hand - Put on your headphones to experience a real-life lush rainforest ambience and center yourself in a deeper experience.
PLAY
Guide your butterflies through the forest and watch them flutter, fly, perch and play! Use gestures to interact with your creatures, drop leaves into caterpillars’ mouths, crack open chrysalises, and guide your butterflies around their growing environment.
